reviews.review: Jeff

[h1]Pretty good job so far[/h1]

[b]Плюсы:[/b]
Регулярный выпуск скинов и длц, благодаря чему вы можете отдать свои деньги Мэтью Коте и его команде
Отличный гейм директор, который посоветует вам пойти поиграть в другую игру, если вам что-то не нравится в его игре (очень хороший маркетинговый ход, неожиданный я бы сказал, и очень даже полезный для вашего психического здоровья)

[b]Минусы:[/b]
Баги, как новые, которые появляются с каждым хотфиксом (после которого перепроверяются все 40 гб игры) так и старые, которые существуют в игре годами и разработчикам на них плевать (яркий пример нюрса)
Отсутствие баланса - игра не планировалась разработчиками для игры против координированных пати с голосом, однако 99% игр на высоком ммр против по крайней мере 2-3 человек, против которых можно играть только хай тир киллерами: нюрса, мор, дух, артист. Соответственно про старых маньяков, которые не соответствуют новым стандартам меты, особенно пеших м1 можно забыть, в связи с появлением нового прекрасного перка на бесконечный хилящий тотем, против которого особенно кайфово играть на многоуровневых картах. Сурвы с аптечкой хилятся секунд за 6-8, а всё потому что ленивые жопы БХВР вместо капа скорости хила делают новые свитеры за золотые клетки. Кому нужно переделывать старых маньяков и делать баланс, приблизив соло сурвов по силе к уровню пати выдав им хотя бы перк киндред по дефолту. Но нет, это денег им не приносит.
Херовая оптимизация. При том, что игра выглядит как мыльная дрисня, на некоторых картах она умудряется пролагивать на далеко не самых старых машинах (привет РПД).
Токсичное коммьюнити. Разработчики, которые вместо переработки механик повешений и вместе с ней туннеля и кемпа, так долго и так сильно издевались над игроками, что тем стало совсем плохо, и они изливают свою желчь друг на друга, купаясь в ней.
Читеры, которые безнаказанно могут делать всё, что захотят. При этом, если читер будет использовать читы на другом, невинном игроке, например хилить его, и это попадёт на видео, его могут забанить. А настоящие читеры, которые с приходом игры в эпике наклепали себе бесплатных акков, будут развлекаться дальше.
Большинство перков как у маньяка так и у сурва бесполезны, по большей части вы будете видеть одни и те же 5-6 перков на протяжении всей игры на хай ммр.
Разработчики уже давно выпускают старых киллеров под видом новых, добавляя им антилуп механики, у них либо закончилась фантазия, либо им просто лень напрягаться, ведь люди и так схавают. Новых механик практически не появляется, за редким исключением (мор, зомби).
Новый матчмейкинг, при котором выиграв пару каток за мана вы будете встречать исключительно фул премейды с дискордом, заводящие все генераторы 4-5 минут, и вам нужно будет очень сильно потеть, чтобы хоть что-то им противопоставить. Аналогично за сурвов, сбежав несколько каток, вы будете встречать одних и тех же 3-5 манов и не дай бог вы будете играть в соло, игра накинет вам челов, которые упадут за 5 секунд и ливнут, либо выпилятся на крюке.
갓겜 500시간만 하면 할만해짐ㅋㅋ

挺好玩了，玩了很多年了，虽然时长只有不到一千，但是也是见证了DBD机的变迁
新月一烧，我立刻开始逛大街了/偷笑
黎明杀机真的很厉害，可以上分为目的，整活为目的，活着出去为目的，现在也联动了越来越多的DLC，放在几年前我们老玩家简直是不敢想的。
最后说一句，欢迎萌新点我陪玩，手把手教，血点大大的多！快乐大大的多！

Tampoco tengo mucho que decir, todo el mundo conoce ya el DBD y sabe que es tremendo juegazo. Tal vez no tanto por su comunidad porque tóxica es un rato pero el juego es divertido.

Eso si, si planeas comprártelo y jugar como superviviente prepárate para que te campeen (que el asesino se quede por tu zona), te hagan facecamp (ya ni por la zona, directamente mirándote) y hagan tunnel vision (que aun teniendo a más gente enfrente suya, siga persiguiéndote a ti justo cuando te acaban de bajar del gancho).

Si puedes soportar que en alguna partida te pase lo de arriba, el juego es totalmente recomendable.

Y para los que ya hayan jugado aquí os dejo un listado de los killers que más divertidos me parecen, junto a las perks que suelo llevar:

Los mejores KILLERS según MI OPINIÓN: Legión, Myers, Cerda, Plaga.
PERKS de KILLER que suelo llevar: Discordancia, Bbq y chile, Ruina, Franklin (hasta las narices de los objetos), Intervención corrupta, Tanatofobia, Vocación de enfermera.
PERKS de SURVIVOR que suelo llevar: Por los demás, Liberación, Fajador (antiguo chungo), Tiempo prestado (muy útil contra los campers), Agilidad, Bendición: Círculo de sanación, Voluntad de hierro.

Este juego no es en si terrorifico, pero produce mucha adrenalina y risas cuando un asesino te persigue y no sabes que hacer, o cuando quedas tu solo e intentas abrir las puertas de salida sin que te pille.
Sin duda en un juego increiblemente divertido

The story of “Dead by Daylight”
In the beginning, you walk into a Steam Store and see Dead by Daylight. Dead by Daylight calls for you, taunts you. It lulls you into a false sense of bravado. Your inner voice reasons with you, “it can’t be that hard, can it?” “I’ve played similar stuff before,” “How bad can it be?” Then you make your first and last mistake. You try a match of Dead by Daylight. The searing pain felt across your brain brings tears to your eyes. You cry out for God. The panic sets in. How do I make it stop?!? Why did I do that? I should have listened to the warnings! You swear never again! 5 minutes, 10 days, 30 years later… The Dead by Daylight still hasn’t ended. 
R.I.P. My nervous system...
страшно пиздес

Great game but be aware of the issues with the dev team.  They tailor the chat and discord to be kid friendly, even though this is not a game for kids.  You can get banned if you point out one of the characters is a child molester and another has been shown to perform sexual violence.  You also may not mention that since the twins allows you to stomp on the small twin, you are essentially kicking the baby.  The in game chat is heavily censored to the point where even saying facecamper, ggswp, ggez, or even some of the characters' names and map names are censored with no option to remove censorship.

In this game about surviving the horror of being stuck in a place with murderers and rapists (Freddy Kreugar reboot version, Pinhead, and Pyramid Head) there can be no naughty language.  After all, this adults only game needs to be child friendly for some reason.  Good job Behaviour.  You made a great game but you are terrible at community management.  Know your audience and stop trying to advertise this thing to kids by having the discord and in game chat be G rated.

Oh and they removed Pinhead's (from Hellraiser) voice line where he says "You opened the box  I CAME" because the latter half is louder and could be considered offensive in this adult content focused game.  They don't want to upset the children that are not allowed to play the game, after all.

Update:  Leatherface had a mask for each of the four original survivors.  After you killed them 25 times each, you got their face.  They now removed them because one of the faces is of a black character and supposedly racists were using it to troll black streamers in a game that has no in game voice chat or text chat.

I absolutely love this game. I play it solo but find it is the most fun with 1 or 2 friends. So many options for killers and survivors, each varying to account to each players interests, especially if a past game or series has interested them to then be brought to life here. Personally, not the biggest fan of playing killer but survivor I could do all day. Although, some things like skin options I feel are a bit lacking on some of the characters. It can be difficult to build up iridescent shards for some people as well, but so far having to actually grind a bit and work to get these types of things can really add to the game and I find it enjoyable and rewarding. It has just enough of scariness to really get your heart going and get you immersed, while at the same time being fun to play. It would be my advice to definitely give this game a try at least once.

I fully went into my time with DBD thinking I'd dislike it.  I played with some friends and it was just that, disappointing and meh.  Fast forward months later, some different friends kept hounding me to play.  I have fell in love with it.  I used to be a FPS person only for multiplayer.  This is in fact my favorite multiplayer game.  For all it's flaws it serves up something wholly unique.  The Additional characters are fairly priced.  The cosmetics are honestly pretty top tier compared to other games I've played.  I don't play super meta killers or survivor loadouts and still have fun.  If you can get some friends together it's great as a survivor.  If you can't you can always play killer.  I do think it is helpful to have someone to tutor you or to watch some youtube videos because the systems are surprisingly deep for a gameplay loop that would otherwise be repetitive.

At the time of this review I have 110 hours, thats been about a month of playing, my highest rank so far being Gold II

Edit: 450 hours in.

This game is still this game.  Somehow entertaining.  Always a good fallback.  Will probably continue to be so until hour 1000.  As far as the company running it BHVR seems like they are being more aware.  Doing stuff like the MMR tests.  As always there are balance issues the game isn't perfect.  But that being said it remains fun.

This game is so incredibly terrible that you'll fucking love it. I'm not even talking about something like bad story, crappy graphics, or poor gameplay. It's just... rage inducing. But when you get that 4k against that tbagging and dead harding Nea SWF it's indescribably satisfying. The skill curve is also very high, but easy to climb on. As you get good at the game, you hate it more and more, but you also love it way too much to uninstall.

All-in-all really different from 2 years ago, overall really good game, good community, great laughs, and a lot of sweat, all characters have unique and interesting abilities, 4v1 is incredibly fair in this game.

Sometimes this game makes me want to find a nice family and kidnap their children, hold them hostage, and make the family pay a unreasonable price for their child back. The amount of sweat and grease that come off some of the players I have gone against is insane, both killers and survivors. The amount of discord mods that are currently probably talking to their kitten right now, that have killed me and proceeded to hook camp me have made me numb. If I had a dollar for every time I have punched my microphone in pure rage while playing this game, I could buy a hyper X quad cast. My poor microphone and everything in my vicinity is broken and or can be labeled as "disabled" 10/10 would recommend

The game is very unbalanced. The killers are way over powered. I really tried to like this game and continued buying DLC for some time in an effort to like it. I even got friends and family members to buy it in an effort to make it more enjoyable. The killers can just guard the area where they hook a player and repeatedly attack you to make you die faster. The scratch marks are a very unfair advantage as even if you get away the killer can still locate you. The scratch marks take a very long time to disappear. Once two people die, the game is pretty much over. I like a challenging game, don't get me wrong, it's just that this game seems designed with a primary focus on making it enjoyable for the killers. The killers move at a faster rate than the players and their attacks are very ranged, even melee attacks. They added in that you can't vault repeatedly through the same window but the killer can guard the area where you are hooked indefinitely. Some killers can set traps right next to the hook zone so other players can't get to you unless they stop and try do deactivate them which doesn't seem like an issue but it is time consuming and the killer can guard the area. Fixing the generators takes way too long and there are way too many skill checks while you are doing it. I could go on and on but you don't want to spend 2 hours reading. Save your money and a headache.

Been playing this game since the beginning and I just gotta say it has truly become a solid horror game. It was gone from infinitely looping a killer easily for hours to struggling to do so a few times. The game has become quite balanced and is very fun to play with friends. Would recommend!
